title: 3 BEDROOM 2 BATHROOM
posting_body: BEAUTIFUL 3 BEDROOM 2 BATH, 2 STORY UPSTAIRS CONDOMINIUM FOR RENT IN A GATED, GREEN VALLEY COMMUNITY.
THE PROPERTY HAS A SPACIOUS OPEN FLOOR PLAN.
IT INCLUDES A DISHWASHER, ELECTRIC COOKTOP, MICROWAVE & A REFRIGERATOR, 2 CAR GARAGE, BREAKFAST BAR, ACCESS TO THE POOL, PARK & BARBECUE AREA.
IMPRESSIVE  VAULTED CEILINGS AND BRIGHT SKYLIGHT LOFT UPSTAIRS BEDROOMS.
THE LIVING ROOM INCLUDES A GAS FIREPLACE AND THE MASTER ROOM INCLUDES DUAL SINKS, SEPERATE BATHTUB AND SHOWER.
THE PROPERTY DOES NOT INCLUDE WASHER AND DRYER BUT HOOKUPS ARE AVAILABLE.
-$50 Application fee per 18 years or Oder.
-We do a criminal and civil background check
-Has to make 2.5 times the rent and provide proof of income.
